title: Wife of UK's finance minister Rishi Sunak is non-domiciled for tax purposes: Spokeswoman - Times of India
content: Wife of UK's finance minister Rishi Sunak is non-domiciled for tax purposes: Spokeswoman  Times of India
description: UK News: LONDON: The wife of British finance minister Rishi Sunak is treated as non-domiciled for UK tax purposes but pays taxes in Britain on all her UK incom.
